# Horse Teaching Program (English)
## Request for Submission of a Statement of Capabilities
The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a lead contractor to provide a Four Season Missatim Ki-Si-Nah-Ma-Too-Win (Horse Teaching) Program at the Okimaw Ohci Healing Lodge.

## Notice Details
* Reference Number: cb-143-45493690
* Amendment Number: 6
* Solicitation Number: 52300-23-4464080
* Publication Date: 2023-10-26
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-15T15:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2028-12-31

## Program Description
The CSC requires a supplier to deliver a Four Season Missatim Ki-Si-Nah-Ma-Too-Win (Horse Teaching) Program to the federally sentenced women of the Okimaw Ohci Healing Lodge. The program should align with the traditional teachings of the Nekaneet First Nation. The objective is to provide a comprehensive and culturally-sensitive program that promotes healing and cultural knowledge.

## Supplier Selection Criteria
The selection of the supplier will be based on the statement of capabilities submitted by the interested suppliers. The following criteria will be evaluated:

* Experience in delivering traditional teachings and ceremonies
*Ability to demonstrate a proven track record in delivering similar programs
*Possession of relevant qualifications and certifications

## Program Requirements
The scope of work includes providing traditional teachings and ceremonies, leading ceremonies and workshops, plus providing daily activity care and attention for horses, including the supervision of participants within the classroom setting.

## Security Requirements
The contractor must comply with the provisions of the Security Requirements Check List and security guide, attached at Annex C. The contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS), issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

## Inquiries and Submission of Statement of Capabilities
For inquiries and to submit a statement of capabilities, please contact Janet Nelson at 501contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca or (306) 659-9300. The closing date for the submission of statements of capabilities is 2023-11-15T15:00:00. Only Indigenous suppliers who meet the requirements of the Indigenous Business Sub sideways may submit a statement of capabilities. The proposed contract is for a period of 5 years
